Question: In 1915 she and George Kessler founded the ____ International (HKI) organization.
Hints: This person devoted much of her later life to raising funds for the American Foundation for the Blind.
This person suffered a series of strokes in 1961 and spent the last years of her life at her home.
When **** visited Akita Prefecture in Japan in July 1937, she inquired about Hachik?, the famed Akita dog that had died in 1935.
